welcome_message_body: Welcome to Miami Gardens, where the sun always shines and the vibrant culture and beautiful beaches await you. Get ready to experience the exciting energy of this city and make unforgettable memories exploring all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: La Catalana Bakery
restaurants.description: La Catalana Bakery is a bakery located in Miami Gardens.
restaurants.address: 4895 NW 183rd St (Miami Gardens Drive and NW 47 Avenue), Miami Gardens, FL 33055

restaurants.name: Yarumba Restaurant & Lounge
restaurants.description: Yarumba Restaurant & Lounge is a caribbean restaurant located in Miami Lakes.

restaurants.name: KFC
restaurants.description: KFC is a fried chicken joint located in Miami Gardens.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Opa Locka Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
